XI.iii.1.B.2.d
.
Treatment of the IU for SC Death Burial Allowance
Do not presume that a Veteran’s death resulted from SC disability or disabilities if the Veteran was receiving compensation at the 100-percent rate due to IU.  A rating decision is required to determine SC death entitlement in this case.
Exception
:  The SC death burial allowance is payable when DIC entitlement is established under
38 U.S.C. 1318
.  This is true even though DIC under
38 U.S.C. 1318
may be established when the Veteran was receiving compensation at the 100-percent rate due to IU.
title: M21-1, Part XI, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B  - Burial Benefits
